Content: In addition to the leadership crisis in the UNP, the appointment of Ranjith Madduma Bandara as the new allainceâ€™s general secretary has been a new problem. It is reported that Ranil Wickremesinghe had asked not to appoint Ranjith Madduma Bandara / Kabir Hashim / Ajith P Perera / Sujeewa Senasinghe or Nalin Bandara as the Secretary of the New Alliance.
